mapper.update: update in_article set a_like=a_like+1 where a_id=#{aid}
update in_article set a_collect=a_collect+1 where a_id=#{aid}
update in_article set a_read_number=#{aReadNumber} where a_id=#{aid}
mapper.select: select a_id,a_title from in_article where u_id = #{uId} limit #{currPage},#{pageSize}
SELECT a_id,a_title,a_cover,a_create_time FROM (SELECT a_id,a_title,a_cover,a_create_time,a_like FROM in_article ORDER BY a_critic DESC) AS article ORDER BY a_like DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT a.* FROM in_article a,in_tag t WHERE FIND_IN_SET(t.t_name,a.a_keyword) AND t.t_category= #{status} GROUP BY a.a_id ORDER BY a.a_create_time DESC LIMIT #{currPage},#{pageSize}
SELECT a.* FROM in_article a,in_tag t WHERE FIND_IN_SET(t.t_name,a.a_keyword) AND t.t_category= #{status} GROUP BY a.a_id ORDER BY a.a_critic DESC LIMIT #{currPage},#{pageSize}
SELECT a.* FROM in_article a,in_tag t WHERE FIND_IN_SET(t.t_name,a.a_keyword) AND t.t_category= #{status} GROUP BY a.a_id ORDER BY a.a_like DESC LIMIT #{currPage},#{pageSize}
SELECT a.* FROM in_article a,in_tag t WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{tName},a.a_keyword) LIMIT #{currPage},#{pageSize}
